scripts.prisma:generate: cd apps/api && dotenvx run -f ../../.env -- prisma generate
scripts.prisma:migrate: cd apps/api && dotenvx run -f ../../.env -- prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:reset: cd apps/api && dotenvx run -f ../../.env -- prisma migrate reset
scripts.prisma:seed: cd apps/api && dotenvx run -f ../../.env -- prisma db seed
